XXdhrmsk_u:1: (DhskD 3r1) saṃmohaḥ pramoho mohaṃ mohajam iyam ucyate avidyā /
XXdhrmsk_u:4: avidyā bhikṣavo hetuḥ saṃrāgāya hetuḥ saṃdveṣāya hetuḥ saṃmohāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:5: iti (DhskD 3r2) yā sā saṃrāgatā saṃmohatā iyam ucyate avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:7: avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṃgamaṃ pūrvanimittam anekavidhānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ (DhskD 3r3)
XXdhrmsk_u:8: dharmāṇāṃ samutpattaye 'nūtpātiko bhavati yad uta āḥrīkyaṃ cānapatrāpyaṃ ca /
XXdhrmsk_u:9: ahrīmān bhikṣavo bhikṣur anapatrāpī mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati /
XXdhrmsk_u:10: tatra bhikṣavo mithyā mithyādṛṣṭyā mithyāsaṃkalpo bhavati /
XXdhrmsk_u:19: iti yā sā mithyādṛṣṭir mithyāsaṃkalpo mithyāvāṅ mithyākarmānto mithyājīvo mithyāvyāyāmo mithyāsmṛtiḥ mithyāsamādhir ima ucyante avidyāpratyayāḥ (DhskD 3r6) saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:21: ye ke cid bhikṣavo 'nekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti sarve te avidyāmūlakā avidyāsamudayā avidyājātīyā avidyāprabhavā /
XXdhrmsk_u:22_0: (DhskD 3r7) avidāgato hi bhikṣavaḥ ajānan kuśalākuśalān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti
XXdhrmsk_u:24: sa evaṃ kuśalākuśalān dharmān yathābhūtam aprajānan sāvadyānavadyān sevitavyāsevitavyān hīnapraṇītakṛṣṇaśuklasapratibhāgapratītyasamutpannān (DhskD 3r9)
XXdhrmsk_u:26: tatra bhikṣavo mithyādṛṣṭyā mithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati vistareṇa yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:28: (DhskD 3v1) api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā kuṃbhopame vyākaraṇe /
XXdhrmsk_u:30: apuṇyān apy āniṃjyān api saṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti /
XXdhrmsk_u:33: vākkarma kuśalāś cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kuśalāś cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:34: yad api tat kuśalasya kāyakarmavākkarmaṇaḥ kuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ dīrgharātraṃ iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ (DhskD 3v3)
XXdhrmsk_u:35: manāpaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate tad idam ucyate puṇyam iti vā puṇyaphalam iti vā puṇyaphalavipākam iti vā /
XXdhrmsk_u:37: āhākuśalaṃ kāyakarmavākkarma akuśalāś cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ akuśalāś cittaviprayuktāḥ (DhskD 3v4) saṃskārā /
XXdhrmsk_u:38_0: yad api tad akuśalasya kāyakarmavākkarmaṇaḥ akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām
XXdhrmsk_u:38_1: akuśalānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ dīrgharātram aniṣṭam akāntam apriyam amanāpaṃ
XXdhrmsk_u:39: ucyate apuṇyam iti vā apuṇyaphalam iti vā apuṇyaphalavipākam iti vā /
XXdhrmsk_u:47: yathā khalv ihaikatyo rāgaparyavasthito dveṣapāryavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṃ carati /
XXdhrmsk_u:51: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyante /
XXdhrmsk_u:57: yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittas /
XXdhrmsk_u:61: sa taṃ prārthayamānas taddhetukaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ carati vācā manasā sucaritaṃ carati /
XXdhrmsk_u:62: iti ye te kuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vā vāksaṃskārā vā manaḥsaṃskārā vā ima ucyante puṇyāḥ (DhskD 3v10) saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:63: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān manuṣyasukhakānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:68: api tv avidyāyāṃ satyām avidyāsaṃcetanāhetoḥ kāyena sucaritaṃ carati vācā manasā sucaritaṃ carati /
XXdhrmsk_u:69: iti ye te kuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vistareṇa yāvan manuṣyasukhakānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:72: yathā manuṣyasukhakānām evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:73: (DhskD 4r3) yathā khalv ihaiko brahmakāyikānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:75: aho batāhaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:76: sa taṃ prārthayamānaḥ taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ (DhskD 4r4)
XXdhrmsk_u:77: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
XXdhrmsk_u:78: tathā samāpannasya yat kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvapariśuddhiḥ ima ucyante puṇyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:80: kāyasya bhedād braḥmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:84: api (DhskD 4r6) tv avidyāyāṃ satyām avidyāsaṃcetanāhetor viviktaṃ kāmair yāvat prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
XXdhrmsk_u:90: yathā brahmakāyikānām evaṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābraḥmāṇāṃ parīttābhānāṃ apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām anabhrakāṇāṃ (DhskD 4r8)
XXdhrmsk_u:93: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ asaṃjñisatvānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:97: sa taṃ prārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ saṃjñām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato manasikaroti āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:99: duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato manasikurvataḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ saṃjñā antarāyaty āsaṃjñikaṃ ca saṃsthihati /
XXdhrmsk_u:100: yatrāsya saṃjñā antarāyaty āsaṃjñikaṃ saṃsthihaty etāvad (DhskD 4v1)
XXdhrmsk_u:102: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvaviśuddhir ima ucyante puṇyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:103: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād asaṃjñisattvānāṃ sabhāgatāyām (DhskD 4v2)
XXdhrmsk_u:107: 'pi tv avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ avidyābhisaṃcetanāhetoḥ saṃjñām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato (DhskD 4v3)
XXdhrmsk_u:108: manasikurute āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:109: tasya vistareṇa yāvad āsaṃjñikaṃ saṃsthihaty etāvat asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ samāpanna iti vaktavyaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:119: aho batāhaṃ ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:120: sa taṃ prārthayamānaḥ taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjnānām atikramāt (DhskD 4v6)
XXdhrmsk_u:121: pratighasaṃjñānāṃ astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati /
XXdhrmsk_u:122: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā cetitaṃ cetanāmitaṃ cetayitatvaṃ (DhskD 4v7)
XXdhrmsk_u:123: cetanāgataṃ cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma ima ucyante āniṃjyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:124: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate tatra ca saṃskārān (DhskD 4v8)
XXdhrmsk_u:128: api tv avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ avidyābhisaṃcetanāhetoḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād (DhskD 4v9)
XXdhrmsk_u:130: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā vistareṇa ima ucyante āniṃjyāḥ saṃskārā /
XXdhrmsk_u:131: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ (DhskD 4v10)
XXdhrmsk_u:137: iti ye te saṃskārā avidyām āgamyāvidyāṃ niśrityāvidyāṃ pratiṣṭhāya utpadyanti samutpadyante jāyanti saṃjāyanti samudāgacchanti (DhskD 5r2)
XXdhrmsk_u:144: lobhaḥ alobhaḥ atha cakṣuḥ saṃskṛtaṃ kumbhopamena /
XXdhrmsk_u:149_0: yatha tāval lobhasahajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya lobhasahajasya vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati
XXdhrmsk_u:149_1: prādurbhāvaś ca dveṣasahajāṃ mohasahajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya mohasahajasya vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati (DhskD 5r4)
XXdhrmsk_u:152: api khalu cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:153: tatra cakṣuḥsaṃskṛtaṃ rūpāṇi ca bāhyaṃ pratyayaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya tad ucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijnānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:155: tatra manaḥsaṃskṛtaṃ dharmāś ca bāhyaṃ pratyayaṃ manovijñānasya tad ucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:156: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā kumbhopamesmin (DhskD 5r6) vyākaraṇe /
XXdhrmsk_u:157: tasya puṇyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtya puṇyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:158: apuṇyān āniṃjyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtyāniṃjyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:162: dveṣaparyavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṃ carati /
XXdhrmsk_u:163: iti ye te akuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā ima ucyante 'puṇyāḥ (DhskD 5r8) saṃskārāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:164: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:166: evam apuṇyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtyāpuṇyopagaṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati /
XXdhrmsk_u:168: kathaṃ puṇyān abhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtya puṇyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:170: yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:173: evaṃ (DhskD 5r10) puṇyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtya puṇyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:174: yathā manuṣyasukhakānām evaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ tatra ca vijñānam abhinirvartayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:177: katham āniṃjyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtyāniṃjyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:179: yathā khalv ihaikatya ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacitto (DhskD 5v2)
XXdhrmsk_u:181: evaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānām iti yāvad vijñānaṃ saṃskārān āgamya vistaraḥ //
XXdhrmsk_u:189: yathā tāval lobhasahajaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya lobhasahajasya kāyakarmavākkarmaṇo 'bhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaś ca lobhasahajā (DhskD 5v4)
XXdhrmsk_u:191: ya idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam idaṃ nāmasya vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpasya /
XXdhrmsk_u:194: mohasahajaṃ viparyayeṇa śuklapakṣeṣv alobhasahajam amohasahajaṃ vaktavyaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:195: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā nādikāvavādavyākaraṇe /
XXdhrmsk_u:198: ity etac chokasahajaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya śokasahajasya kāyavākkarmaṇo 'bhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:201: idaṃ nāmasya vijñānaṃ vijñānasya pratyayaṃ nāmarūpasya /
XXdhrmsk_u:203: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā phalgunāvavāde vyākaraṇe /
XXdhrmsk_u:205: phalguna āhāraṃ yāvad evāyatyāṃ punarbhavasyābhinirvṛttaye prādurbhāvāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:208: yat tad gandharvasya caramaṃ cittaṃ manovijñānaṃ ācitam upacitaṃ pratiṣṭhitam aprahatam aparijñātaṃ (DhskD 5v9)
XXdhrmsk_u:210: yasya vijñānasya samanantaraṃ mātuḥ kukṣau kalalātmabhāvo 'bhisaṃmūrcchati /
XXdhrmsk_u:212: idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārās tajjaṃ (DhskD 5v10)
XXdhrmsk_u:215: asti khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā svātiṃ bhikṣuṃ kaivartapūrviṇam ārabhya /
XXdhrmsk_u:219: iha bhikṣavo mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ sannipatitau mātā ca kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito (DhskD 6r2) bhavati /
XXdhrmsk_u:220: imeṣāṃ bhikṣavas trayāṇāṃ sannipātān mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntir bhavati /
XXdhrmsk_u:221: iti yat tad garbhasya caramaṃ cittaṃ manovijñānaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānapratyayayaṃ (DhskD 6r3)
XXdhrmsk_u:224: asti khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye vyākaraṇe āyuṣmate ānandāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:232: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣau nāvakramiṣyad api nu nāmarūpaṃ kalalatvaṃ hi saṃmurcchiṣyat* /
XXdhrmsk_u:234: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣau nāvakramitvā punar na vyutkramiṣyat* (DhskD 6r6)
XXdhrmsk_u:235: api nu nāmarūpaṃ imaṃ dhātum āgamiṣyan /
XXdhrmsk_u:237: vijñānaṃ ced ānandādāv eva daḥram asya taruṇasya kumārakasya ucchidyeta vinaśyeta na bhaveta api nu nāmarūpaṃ virūḍhiṃ (DhskD 6r7)
XXdhrmsk_u:240: sarvaśo vā punaḥ sarvaśa ānanda vijñāne asati na nāmarūpaṃ prajñāyeta /
XXdhrmsk_u:242: tasmād dhi ānanda etan nidānam eṣa hetuḥ eṣa pratyayo nāmarūpasya (DhskD 6r8)
XXdhrmsk_u:245: iti mayā yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktaṃ //
XXdhrmsk_u:248: dvayapratyayāt* vijñānaṃ phalgunaḥ svātir eva ca
XXdhrmsk_u:253: tatra yac cakṣur yāni ca rūpāṇi idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:259: (DhskD 6v1) tatra ye rūpiṇo manovijñeyā dharmā idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ tajjaṃ vijñānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:260: idaṃ nāmarūpasya tajjaṃ manasikāraṃ nāmapratyayasya manovijñānasya /
XXdhrmsk_u:262: api (DhskD 6v2) khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā phalgunāvavāde vyākaraṇe /
XXdhrmsk_u:263: vijñānaṃ phalgunāhāraṃ yāvad evāyatyāṃ punarbhavasyābhinirvṛttaye prādurbhāvāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:266: yat tad gandharvasya caramaṃ cittaṃ vistareṇa yāvad (DhskD 6v3)
XXdhrmsk_u:267: yasya gandharvasya samanantaraṃ mātuḥ kukṣau kalalam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃmūrcchati /
XXdhrmsk_u:269: idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārās tajjaṃ vijñānaṃ idaṃ nāmasya /
XXdhrmsk_u:271: nāmarūpaṃ pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvas /
XXdhrmsk_u:273: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā svātiṃ bhikṣuṃ kaivartapūrviṇam ārabhya /
XXdhrmsk_u:277: ity evam ayoniśomanasikāreṇa sahajaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānasyāvakrāntir bhavati prādurbhāvas /
XXdhrmsk_u:279: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye /
XXdhrmsk_u:281: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda nāmarūpapratiṣṭhāṃ na labheta tathāpratiṣṭhite vijñāne anatirūḍhe + + + + + (DhskD 6v7)
XXdhrmsk_u:284: sarvaśo vā punar ānanda nāmarūpe asati api nu vijñānaṃ prajñāyeta /

XXdhrmsk_u:291: śītodikā puṣkariṇī svātir eva ca rāgajaṃ
XXdhrmsk_u:295: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ śītapracurād uṣṇaṃ gacchati /
XXdhrmsk_u:298: mahābhūtāni idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ idaṃ nāmasya /
XXdhrmsk_u:299: ity etac chītasahajaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pratītya cakṣurindriyasyopacayo bhavati /
XXdhrmsk_u:300: (DhskD 7r1) evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi tatra upacīyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:303: yathā khalv ihaikatyo jighatsādaurbalyaparītaḥ śuci prāṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyam khādayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:305: tatra yac ca bhojanaṃ yāni ca bhojanasahajāni mahābhūtāni idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā /
XXdhrmsk_u:307: yathā khalv ihaikatyas tṛṣitaḥ klāntaḥ pipāsitaḥ (DhskD 7r3)
XXdhrmsk_u:309: tasya tata utpadyante pānasahajāni mahābhūtāni / vistaraḥ /

XXdhrmsk_u:665: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyaṃ paryavasthānam utpādayati (DhskD 11r8)
XXdhrmsk_u:666: adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ tīvrāt tīvrataraṃ pūrṇāt pūritataraṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:667: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimam upādānaṃ tad ucyante tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ upādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:668: yathā khalv ihaikatyo rūpeṣv ārūpyeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacitta (DhskD 11r9)
XXdhrmsk_u:670: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:671: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimam upādānam* /
XXdhrmsk_u:673: asti khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā pātaleyavyākaraṇe /
XXdhrmsk_u:674: deśitā vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmāḥ skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:675: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakpradhānāni (DhskD 11v1)
XXdhrmsk_u:676: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ paṃcendriyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṃgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga /
XXdhrmsk_u:677: evaṃ deśiteṣu vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmeṣu skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:678: atha ca punar ihaikatyā mohapuruṣā na tīvracchandā viharanti na tīvrasnehā na tīvrapremāṇo (DhskD 11v2)
XXdhrmsk_u:680: te dhandham evānuttaryaṃ spṛśanti yad utāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:681: evaṃ deśiteṣu vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmeṣu skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:682: atha ca punar ihaikatyāḥ kulaputrāḥ atīvatīvracchandā viharanti atīvatīvrasnehā (DhskD 11v3)
XXdhrmsk_u:684: te kṣipram evānuttaryaṃ spṛśanti yad utāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:685: evaṃ deśiteṣu vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmeṣu skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:686: atha ca punar ihaikatyo rūpam ātmataḥ (DhskD 11v4)
XXdhrmsk_u:689: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ kinnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhavāḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:694: tṛṣṇā bhikṣavo vedanānidānā vedanāsamudayā vedanājātīyā vedanāprabhavā /
XXdhrmsk_u:695: vedanā punar bhikṣavaḥ kinnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātīyā kiṃprabhavā /
XXdhrmsk_u:701: tatra bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:702: so 'pi sparśaḥ sāpi vedanā sāpi tṛṣṇā sāpi samanupaśyanā anityā saṃskṛtā cetitā pratītyasamutpannā / (DhskD 11v8)
XXdhrmsk_u:703: sa rūpam ātmeti samanupaśyatīti satkāyadṛṣṭiparyavasthānam utpādayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:704: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ (DhskD 11v9) /
XXdhrmsk_u:705: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimam upādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:707: na haiva rūpam ātmeti samanupaśyaty api tu rūpavantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:708: na haiva rūpavantam ātmānaṃ saṃanupaśyaty api (DhskD 11v10)
XXdhrmsk_u:710: na haiva rūpam ātmīyaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu rūpe ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:711: na haiva rūpe ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vedanām ātmataḥ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:713: saṃanupaśyaty api tu vedanāvantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:714: na haiva vedanāvantaṃ ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vedanām ātmīyāṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:715: na haiva vedanām ātmīyāṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vedanāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:716: (DhskD 12r2) na haiva vedanāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñām ātmataḥ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:717: na haiva saṃjñām ātmataḥ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñāvantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:718: na haiva saṃjñāvantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñām ātmīyāṃ (DhskD 12r3)
XXdhrmsk_u:720: na haiva saṃjñām ātmīyāṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:721: na haiva saṃjñāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃskārān ātmataḥ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:723: samanupaśyaty api tu saṃskāravantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati / vistaraḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:725: na haiva vijñānam ātmataḥ samanupaśyaty api tu vijñānavantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:727: samanupaśyati api tu vijñānam ātmīyaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:728: na haiva vijñānam ātmīyaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vijñāne ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
XXdhrmsk_u:729: na haiva vijñāne ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu kāṃkṣī bhavati vicikitsī /
XXdhrmsk_u:730: na haiva kāṃkṣī bhavati vicikitsī api (DhskD 12r6)
XXdhrmsk_u:732: na haiva bhavadṛṣṭir bhavati vibhavadṛṣṭiḥ api tv astīti vācādhigataṃ bhavaty /
XXdhrmsk_u:734: yo 'sāv asmīty adhigamo 'yam aham asmīty adhigamo /
XXdhrmsk_u:737: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhavā /
XXdhrmsk_u:739: tatra bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:740: so 'pi sparśaḥ sāpi vedanā sāpi tṛṣṇā (DhskD 12r8)
XXdhrmsk_u:741: te 'pi saṃskārāḥ sāpi samanupaśyanā anityā saṃskṛtā cetitā pratītyasamutpannā asmīty adhigatā bhavaty /
XXdhrmsk_u:745: paryavasthānam utpādayati adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ tīvrāt tīvrataraṃ paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:746: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ trṣṇā paścimam upādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:749: antagrāhadṛṣṭiparyavasthānam utpādayaty adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataram /
XXdhrmsk_u:750: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimakam upādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:763: paraṃ maraṇād bhavati ca na bhavati ca /
XXdhrmsk_u:764: naiva bhavati na na bhavati paraṃ maraṇād /
XXdhrmsk_u:766: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:767: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimakam (DhskD 12v3) upādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:769_0: api khalu na bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno na
XXdhrmsk_u:769_1: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadaṃyasārathi śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāṃ
XXdhrmsk_u:771: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād vistareṇa paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:773: na svākhyāto bhagavato dharmo na sāṃdṛṣṭiko na nirjvaraḥ nākālikaḥ naupanāyiko naihipaśyakaḥ (DhskD 12v5)
XXdhrmsk_u:775: na supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho na ṛjupratipanno na nyāyapratipanno na sāmīcīpratipanno nānudharmacārī /
XXdhrmsk_u:782: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:787: api khalu śāśvato loka idam eva satyaṃ moham anyad /
XXdhrmsk_u:793: śāśvato loko vistareṇa yāvac caiva bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇād iti idam eva satyaṃ mohaṃ anyad /
XXdhrmsk_u:795: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:799: śīlena śucyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /
XXdhrmsk_u:801: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānaṃ utpādayati (DhskD 13r1) /
XXdhrmsk_u:804: vrataṃ parāmṛśati yad ubhayataḥ śīlavrataṃ parāmṛśati /
XXdhrmsk_u:805: śīlavratena śucyati mucyate niryāti yāvat sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikramam anuprāpnoti (DhskD 13r2) /
XXdhrmsk_u:807: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:810: api khalu tathāgato bhagavān arhan samyaksaṃbuddho (DhskD 13r3)
XXdhrmsk_u:812: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyaṃ paryavasthānam utpādayati /
XXdhrmsk_u:821: (DhskD 13r5) svākhyāto bhagavato dharmo na svākhyāto bhagavato dharmaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:829: supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho na supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:846: api khalu sarvāṇy eva catvāry upādānāni tṛṣṇāsamudayāni tṛṣṇājātīyāni tṛṣṇāprabhavāni /
XXdhrmsk_u:851: kāmapratisaṃyuktāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataṃ ca sthāpya yāni tadanyāni kāmapratisaṃyuktāni saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānāni idam ucyate (DhskD 13v1)
XXdhrmsk_u:855: catasro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭyupādānam ity ucyate satkāyadṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭir mithyādṛṣṭir dṛṣṭiparāmarśa itīmāś catasro dṛṣṭayo /
XXdhrmsk_u:858: yathā (DhskD 13v2) khalv ihaikatyaḥ śīlaṃ parāmṛśati vistareṇa yāvat* /
XXdhrmsk_u:859: ubhayena śīlavratena śucyati mucyate niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramam anuprāpnoti /
XXdhrmsk_u:863: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataṃ ca sthāpya tadanyāni rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāni saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānānīdam ucyate ātmavādopādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:864: (DhskD 13v4) api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidāne vyākaraṇe āyuṣmaty ānande /
XXdhrmsk_u:866: tṛṣṇā ced ānanda nābhaviṣyad api nu kasya cit kā cit tṛṣṇābhaviṣyan /
XXdhrmsk_u:869: tṛṣṇāyām asatyām api nu upādānaṃ prajñāpayeta /
XXdhrmsk_u:871: tasmāt tarhy ānanda etan nidānam eṣa hetur eṣa samudaya eṣa pratyayaḥ upādānasya yad uta tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:872: iti (DhskD 13v6) yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktam iti //
XXdhrmsk_u:876: upādānāny eva pratītyānekavidhā bhavaprajñaptir uktā bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:877: ekavidhā asti bhavaprajñaptir yatra traidhātukāḥ paṃca skandhā uktā bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:878: (DhskD 13v7) asti bhavaprajñaptir yatrāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartakaṃ karmoktaṃ bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:879: asti bhavaprajñaptir yatropapattyaṃgikā paṃca skandhā uktā bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:880: katamā bhavaprajñaptir yatra traidhātukāḥ paṃca skandhā bhavā uktā (DhskD 13v8) bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:883: iyaṃ bhavaprajñaptir yatra traidhātukāḥ paṃca skandhā bhava uktā bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:884: katamā bhavaprajñaptir yatrāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartakaṃ karmoktaṃ bhagavatā (DhskD 13v9) /
XXdhrmsk_u:886: yad api tad ānanda karmāyatyāṃ punarbhavāya saṃvartate idam atra bhavasya /
XXdhrmsk_u:887: iyaṃ bhavaprajñaptir yatrāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartakaṃ karma bhava uktaṃ bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:891: vijñānaṃ phalgunāhāraṃ yāvad evāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartaye prādurbhāvāya /
XXdhrmsk_u:892: iyaṃ bhavaprajñaptir yatropapattyāṃgikāḥ paṃca skandhā bhava uktaṃ bhagavatā /
XXdhrmsk_u:893: api (DhskD 14r1) khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā nidānaparyāye vyākaraṇe āyuṣmaty ānande /
XXdhrmsk_u:896: sarvaśo vā punar ānanda upādāne asati api nu bhavaḥ prajñāyeta /
XXdhrmsk_u:899: caiṣa hetur eṣa samudaya eṣa pratyayo bhavasya yad utopādānaṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:901: iti yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktaṃ //
XXdhrmsk_u:906: dveṣaparyavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṃ carati /
XXdhrmsk_u:907: ye te akuśalā kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā ayam ucyate akuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:910: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ skandhapratilābho dhātupratilābha āyatanapratilābho jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāva itīyaṃ jātir (DhskD 14r5)
XXdhrmsk_u:911: imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir /
XXdhrmsk_u:913: yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:917: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ carati vācā manasā sucaritaṃ carati /
XXdhrmsk_u:918: ye te kuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā (DhskD 14r7)
XXdhrmsk_u:920: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān manuṣyasubhagānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:921: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir vistareṇa tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jāti /
XXdhrmsk_u:923: evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ /
XXdhrmsk_u:924: yathā khalv ihaikatyo brahmakāyikānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ tasyaivaṃ bhavaty (DhskD 14r9) /
XXdhrmsk_u:925: aho batāhaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
XXdhrmsk_u:926: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ (DhskD 14r10)
XXdhrmsk_u:928: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvara ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:929: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād (DhskD 14v1)
XXdhrmsk_u:932: iyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir iti /
XXdhrmsk_u:934: (DhskD 14v2) yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ parīttābhānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:936: aho batāhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
XXdhrmsk_u:938: adhyātmasaṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
XXdhrmsk_u:939: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvara ājīvapariśuddhiḥ ayam ucyate (DhskD 14v4)
XXdhrmsk_u:941: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt parīttābhanāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:942: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir vistareṇa jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:946: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ parīttaśubhānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:950: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati /
XXdhrmsk_u:951: smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate /
XXdhrmsk_u:952: yat (DhskD 14v7) tad āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimāṃ sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
XXdhrmsk_u:953: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:954: (DhskD 14v8) yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt parīttaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
XXdhrmsk_u:959: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ anabhrakāṇāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:961: aho batāham anabhrakāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
XXdhrmsk_u:963_0: taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva
XXdhrmsk_u:963_1: ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astagamād aduḥkhāsukhaṃ upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ
XXdhrmsk_u:964: (DhskD 15r1) tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvara ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
XXdhrmsk_u:965: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād anabhrakāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate (DhskD 15r2) /
